Today I have a very special please to this great community.

I've been a friend of Cryptoworld and Blockchaintechnology for years.
I think that we are entering the future of the digital world here and that all those who work with it can benefit immensely.

Since I always like to think about my fellow human beings, I also try to be close to those who are close to me, to convince them of this forward-looking technology.

ONLY this is not always successful.

I always hear refusal and mistrust.

This has brought me to the following bet I have decided with my work colleagues today.



Since I regard Steemit as an absolute showcase project of the Blockchain and trust deeply in the people, I was offered the following bet.

According to my colleagues, I should be able to generate at least 500 followers in 2 weeks and earn at least 100 USD.


So my message to you all out there:

PLEASE SHOW ALL THE UNBELIEVABLE WHAT A GREAT COMMUNITY THIS IS, AND ALSO CONFIRMS ME MY TRUST IN THIS PROJECT.

![team-spirit-2447163__340.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUBcT7rmrKAaQ16n2P1CkzGMZyVEBZ7krX6wR65oi4bjq/team-spirit-2447163__340.jpg)

500 FOLLOWERS in 2 weeks - that would give me the perfect proof that it WORKS. Of course, I'm happy about everyone else too.
And I can teach all the bad talking people a better one.

This is another way to drop a post, I hope you do not mind me.
I would like to help all doubters, and here I could provide a good proof.

Therefore, I am looking forward to many new friends and happy discussions

![Success.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYpd8B7gMhViHvHnBK5N1BjgYJAnTxB8bh2NHTHznwU3Y/Success.jpg)
Happy STEEMIT
